articles.title: Protein and cognition: Increased intake in older age linked with reduced risk of impairment – China data - FoodNavigator-Asia.com
articles.description: Increasing protein intake appears to reduce the risk of cognitive impairment in older age, while an extreme decline in animal-based protein consumption is linked with a 48% increase, new data from a long-term China study suggests.
